ygData.subject: Re: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve made the trip through High Pass and through Kithicor many times now, and haven t been spotted yet. The last trip I made I went loaded with plat and bought
ygData.messageBody:
I've made the trip through High Pass and through Kithicor many times now,
and haven't been spotted yet.

The last trip I made I went loaded with plat and bought my 12th, 16th, 20th,
and 24th level animations just so I don't have to make the trip when I
level, I just go to the bank and mem my new pet. It was a rather expensive
trip, but I think it was worth it.

Just a thought.

Chantro, level 14 enchanter, The Rathe


-----Original Message-----
From: Bit Net <dante@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 1:59 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] 8th level pet


>From: "Bit Net" <dante@...>
>
>I made the trip and had no problems, just lucky I guess.
>I also gated back the moment I bought it, call me chicken but the thought
of
>walking back to get my corpse was to much.
>
>Try,try again..
>
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: rival@... <rival@...>
>To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Date: Saturday, May 08, 1999 2:21 PM
>Subject: [eqenchanters] 8th level pet
>
>
>>From: rival@...
>>
>>I'm sorry if this message sounds bad, but i love the game, just a little
>upset right now. I finally made 8th level, and so off I go to get my pet
>spell. I had read many reports on this list, so I thought myself prepared.
>After about an hour and a half trip from Felwithe, I finally reach High
Hold
>Pass. My invisibility still going strong, I procede in a short distance
>only to be rooted and killed by some #@!!@#$ orc who could see invisible.
I
>came from Kithicor forest. Was I just unlucky? Is there another better
way
>in, other than through kithicor? That place is insane. How do they expect
>us to ever get a pet at this level? I've been hearing Mages whine about
>have to research 24th level pets. How about getting screwed out of 8th
>level. If my bitching is unfounded, please tell me. I will appologize.
If
>there is an easier way, or I just got unlucky, let me know. Please.
>>
